name: Spooky Halloween Scene
description:
Title: Spooky Halloween Scene

Platform: PC/Web

Genre: Exploration/Adventure/Horror

Rating: E for Everyone

Market: Ages 6+, casual gamers

Game Overview: Learning audio and animations in Unity using a free assets package in the Unity store. 

Instructions: WASD to move around, shift to sprint, and space bar to jump. 

Game Design Team: Bridget Kurr – Game Designer
